tile.bedrockores.bedrock_miner.name: Bedrock Miner
tile.bedrockores.bedrock_ore.name: Bedrock Ore
commands.bedrockores.usage: Master command for all commands in the Bedrock Ores mod. Use tab-completion to explore sub-commands.
commands.bedrockores.wrap.usage: Call while looking at a block to convert it to a bedrock ore. Optionally specify yield of created bedrock ore.
commands.bedrockores.unwrap.usage: Call while looking at a bedrock ore block to convert it back to the block it wraps.
commands.bedrockores.list: §aAll ores we may embed in bedrock:
commands.bedrockores.list_errors_epilogu: §cPlease check your log for warnings for more information.
commands.bedrockores.info: §aAll ores we may embed in bedrock in dimension §r%s§a (type: §r%s§a), biome §r%s§a (types: §r%s§a, dictionary types: §r%s§a):
tooltip.bedrockores.bedrock_miner: §7Mines the 5x3x5 area below it for bedrock ores.
